dmca.title: I'd like to report this site
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Krissy Johnson - Phenomenon Productions [mailto:krissyj@gmail.com]

Posted At: Tuesday, September 12, 2006 6:52 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: I'd like to report this site
Subject: Fwd: I'd like to report this site


http://www.chroniccentral.net/rivercity/

with so many servers i know you can't be expected to know what each
member is doing so hopefully this email will help. this user is
displaying copyrighted content througout the forum, including some of my
own.

http://www.chroniccentral.net/rivercity/viewtopic.php?t=6223
http://www.chroniccentral.net/rivercity/viewtopic.php?t=6255
http://www.chroniccentral.net/rivercity/viewtopic.php?t=5960

I would have contacted the webmaster but with these types of
stolen-content based forums, asking them to remove content does nothing
but start a website hacking war.  Please keep my name anonymous so that
I don't have to deal with any backlash from reporting this.

Thanks!

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Analog <analog1981@excite.com>
Date: Sep 12, 2006 4:40 PM
Subject: I'd like to report this site
To: krissyj@gmail.com



I'd like to report this site:

They are illegally distrubing your images:

http://www.chroniccentral.net/rivercity/viewtopic.php?t=6223

Get the feds and have that forum shut down for good.

_______________________________________________
Join Excite! - http://www.excite.com
The most personalized portal on the Web!
